auth.signInToAccount: Sign in to your account to continue
auth.getStartedWithWorkspace: Get started with your new workspace
auth.passwordRequirements: Must include uppercase, lowercase, number, and special character
auth.logOutAllDevicesDescription: End all active sessions across all devices. Use this if you suspect unauthorized access to your account.
auth.logOutAllDevicesWarning: This will end all active sessions, including this one. You will need to log in again to continue using the application.
auth.errors.tooManyAttempts: Too many failed attempts. Try again later.
auth.errors.unableToCreateAccount: Unable to create account. Please try again or use a different email.
auth.errors.newPasswordMustDiffer: New password must be different from current password
auth.errors.failedToChangePassword: Failed to change password. Please try again.
auth.errors.failedToLogOutAll: Failed to log out all devices. Please try again.
auth.errors.roleAuthorizationRequired: You don't have permission to access this resource. Please contact your administrator if you believe this is an error.
auth.errors.noRoleAssigned: No role assigned to your account
auth.settings.title: Settings
auth.settings.description: Manage your account settings and security preferences.
auth.settings.updatePasswordDescription: Update your password. This will log you out of all devices for security.
users.name: Name
users.addUser: Add a new user to the system.
users.manageRolesDescription: Manage user accounts, roles, and permissions.
users.errors.emailExists: A user with this email already exists
users.errors.onlyOwnersCanCreateOwners: Only owners can create other owners
users.errors.ownersCannotChangeOwnRole: Owners cannot change their own role
users.errors.onlyOwnersCanPromote: Only owners can promote users to owner
users.errors.cannotRemoveSelf: You cannot remove yourself from the organization
users.errors.onlyOwnersCanRemoveOwners: Only owners can remove other owners
orgs.errors.onlyOwnerCanUpdate: Only the organization owner can update it
orgs.errors.onlyOwnerCanDelete: Only the organization owner can delete it
orgs.errors.noAccess: You do not have access to this organization
jobs.queueDescription: Queue a new background job for processing.
jobs.aboutJobsDescription: Jobs are processed asynchronously by the worker service. Once queued, they will be picked up and executed based on their priority and any configured delay.
jobs.dataJsonDesc: Additional job data as JSON object
jobs.errors.mustBeLoggedIn: You must be logged in to create jobs
notifications.empty.description: When you receive notifications, they'll appear here.
notifications.empty.allCaughtUpDesc: You're all caught up! No new notifications to review.
notifications.empty.noReadYet: You haven't read any notifications yet.

common.dashboard.weeklyActivityDesc: Visitors and sessions over the past week

common.errorTest.description: Test that the error boundary catches component errors gracefully.
common.errorTest.triggerErrorDescription: Click the button below to throw an error and test the error boundary.
common.analytics.description: View detailed analytics and performance metrics.
